project.name: |-- 006-reacting-to-async-calls-completion
project.description:
Keywords: + Future + CompletableFuture + thenAccept()
This project includes a very simple example that illustrates how to register a Consumer that will be invoked as soon as the CompletableFuture is available.
BestPriceFinderRunner: Demonstrates how to use the thenAccept() method to perform the display of the price that is computed async as soon as it is available, without waiting for the prices from all the shops to be available.
